function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of community engagement in public health strategies","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and overlooked populations","Mitigation":"Encourage community involvement, raise awareness, and prioritize marginalized groups","Technologies":"Community outreach programs, educational campaigns, and communication tools","People":"HCP, public health specialists, academics, researchers, policy-makers","Owner":"Public health departments, community organizations, and policymakers"}]}
